Name: Essentials for Spotify
Description: Effortlessly control your Spotify through your Elgato Stream Deck. A Spotify Premium account is required to use the full functionality of this plugin.

com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.setup-.Name: Setup
com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.setup-.Tooltip: Start here to setup Essentials for Spotify and optionally configure a stream overlay.

com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.play-p.Name: Play / Pause
com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.play-p.Tooltip: Toggles between playing and pausing the current song.

com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.previo.Name: Previous Song
com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.previo.Tooltip: Skips to the previous song. Hold for backward seek.

com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.next-s.Name: Next Song
com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.next-s.Tooltip: Advances to the next song. Hold for forward seek.

com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.song-s.Name: Song Stack
com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.song-s.Tooltip: Displays the information of the current song and offers a variety of control actions.

com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.backwa.Name: Backward Seek
com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.backwa.Tooltip: Seek backward in the current song.

com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.forwar.Name: Forward Seek
com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.forwar.Tooltip: Seek forward in the current song.

com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.loop-c.Name: Loop Context
com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.loop-c.Tooltip: Repeats the current playlist or album.

com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.mode-s.Name: Mode Stack
com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.mode-s.Tooltip: A button that combines shuffle, loop context and loop song into one.

com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.like-u.Name: Like / Unlike
com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.like-u.Tooltip: Adds the current song to your liked songs or removes it if already liked.

com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.add-to.Name: Add to Playlist
com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.add-to.Tooltip: Adds the currently playing song to a selected playlist of yours non-exclusively.

com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.song-e.Name: Explicit Indicator
com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.song-e.Tooltip: Shows whether the current song is explicit or not

com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.volume.Name: Volume Mute / Unmute
com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.volume.Tooltip: Toggles between muting and unmuting the volume.

com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.volume.Name: Volume Stack
com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.volume.Tooltip: A button that combines volume up, volume down and volume mute / unmute into one.

com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.set-vo.Name: Set Volume
com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.set-vo.Tooltip: Sets the playback volume to a specific level.

com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.play-c.Name: Play Context
com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.play-c.Tooltip: Map this button to any supported Spotify URL and press it to start playing.

com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.song-c.Name: Song Clipboard
com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.song-c.Tooltip: Copies the information of the current song to the clipboard.

com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.contex.Name: Context Information
com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.contex.Tooltip: Displays the information of the current context.

com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.transf.Name: Transfer Playback
com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.transf.Tooltip: Allows you to transfer the playback to another device.

com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.user-i.Name: User Information
com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.user-i.Tooltip: Displays the information of the connected user.

com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.playba.Name: Playback Control
com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.playba.Tooltip: Controls the playback of the current song.

com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.my-pla.Name: My Playlists
com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.my-pla.Tooltip: Navigate and play through your playlists.

com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.my-lik.Name: My Liked Songs
com.ntanis.essentials-for-spotify.my-lik.Tooltip: Navigate and play through your liked songs.

Setup.close_message: You may close this page now.
Setup.vpn_warning:
If you are using a VPN, you may need to temporarily disable it.
You can re-enable it afterwards.
Setup.step1: Login to Spotify for Developers with your Spotify account.
Setup.step4: Check "Web API" in "Which API/SDKs are you planning to use?".
Setup.step5: Fill the rest of the form to your liking, "Website" can be left empty.
Setup.step6: Create the app and navigate to the app's dashboard.
Setup.step7: Click "Basic Information" in the app's dashboard.
Setup.step8: Copy the "Client ID" to the form below.
Setup.step9: Click "View client secret" and copy the "Client secret" to the form below.
Setup.error_message: Please double-check the app information and try again.
